info.title: Geogen API
info.description: API for accessing LLM visibility data, managing entities, and tracking AI mentions.

bearerAuth.description: API key authentication. Format: Bearer wsk_your_api_key

get.description: Get workspace information, usage limits, and credit balance.
Get all team members in the workspace.
Get all tags in the workspace.
Get all entities in the workspace.

post.description:
Create a new entity and start tracking its visibility across LLMs.

Prompts can be handled in three ways:
- **Custom prompts**: Provide your own prompts via the `prompts` array. They will inherit the entity's `language` and `geolocation`.
- **Auto-generate** (default): Omit the `prompts` field and AI will generate relevant prompts based on the entity's description, language, and geolocation.
- **No prompts**: Set `generatePrompts` to `false` to create the entity without any prompts. You can add prompts later via the Add Prompt endpoint.

language.description: Language code for the entity and its prompts (e.g., 'en', 'fr', 'de'). All prompts — whether custom or auto-generated — will use this language.

geolocation.description: Geolocation code for the entity and its prompts (e.g., 'global', 'us', 'gb'). All prompts will use this geolocation.

prompts.description: Custom prompts for tracking. Each prompt is a plain text string. All prompts inherit the entity's language and geolocation — no need to specify them per prompt. When provided, auto-generation is skipped.

generatePrompts.description: Whether to auto-generate prompts using AI. Ignored when the `prompts` array is provided. Set to `false` to create the entity without any prompts.

with_custom_prompts.description: Provide your own prompts. All prompts will inherit the entity's language (fr) and geolocation (fr). Auto-generation is skipped.

value.name: Mon Site
value.description: Plateforme de gestion de projet pour les équipes distantes
prompts: Quel est le meilleur outil de gestion de projet pour les équipes à distance ?
Quels logiciels recommandez-vous pour la collaboration en ligne ?
Quelles sont les meilleures alternatives à Trello en France ?

auto_generate_prompts.description: Omit the prompts field to let AI generate relevant prompts based on the entity's description, language, and geolocation.

value.name: My Website
value.description: Project management platform for remote teams with task tracking and time management features

no_prompts.description: Create the entity without any prompts. You can add prompts later via the Add Prompt endpoint.

value.name: My Website
value.description: Project management platform for remote teams

promptsGenerated.description: Number of prompts saved for this entity (0 if generatePrompts was false and no custom prompts were provided)

prompts.description: The saved prompts for this entity. Each prompt inherits the entity's language and geolocation.

get.description: Check if a domain is available for tracking before creating an entity. Returns whether the domain is available, already in your workspace, or tracked by another user.

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: Domain to check (e.g., example.com or https://example.com)

available.description: Whether the domain is available for tracking

value.message: This domain is available for tracking.
This domain is already tracked in your workspace.
This domain is already being tracked by another user.

get.description: Get prompts for a specific entity with performance stats.

post.description:
Create one or more prompts for an entity. Supports both single prompt and bulk upload modes.

**Single prompt mode:** Use `prompt` field with a string value.

**Bulk upload mode:** Use `prompts` field with an array of prompt objects. Each object can have its own language/geolocation, or inherit from the top-level defaults.

prompts.description: Array of prompts (for bulk upload mode)

value.prompt: What are the best tools for SEO?

prompts.prompt: What are the best SEO tools?
Quelles sont les meilleures outils SEO?
What is the best marketing software in UK?

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Comma-separated tag IDs to filter prompts by

parameters.name: promptIds
parameters.description: Comma-separated prompt IDs to filter by specific prompts

get.description: Get detailed URLs for a specific cited domain. Use the citedEntityUuid from the Get Citations endpoint to retrieve the individual citation URLs.

parameters.name: citedEntityUuid
parameters.description: UUID of the cited entity (from Get Citations response)

citationCount.description: Number of times this URL was cited

period.description: The time period used for the query

get.description: Get LLM responses with mention status.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Comma-separated tag IDs to filter prompts by

parameters.name: promptIds
parameters.description: Comma-separated prompt IDs to filter by specific prompts

get.description: Get comprehensive details for a single LLM response, including all mentions, citations, and query fanouts associated with it.

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: Entity ID to get mention context for

responseText.description: Full response text from the LLM

createdAt.description: ISO timestamp when response was created

modelId.description: Model UUID that generated this response

isMentioned.description: Whether the entity was mentioned in this response

mentionPosition.description: Position of entity mention in the ranked list (if applicable)

mentionSentiment.description: Sentiment score of entity mention (-1 to 1)

totalOptionsInList.description: Total items in the ranked list (if applicable)

mentions.description: All entities mentioned in this response

isCurrentEntity.description: Whether this is the queried entity

citations.description: All URLs cited in this response

entityUuid.description: Entity UUID associated with this citation

queryFanouts.description: Web search queries the LLM performed while generating this response

response.responseText: Here are the top project management tools...

prompt.prompt: What are the best project management tools?

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Comma-separated tag IDs to filter prompts by

parameters.name: promptIds
parameters.description: Comma-separated prompt IDs to filter by specific prompts

get.description: Get web search queries that LLMs performed during response generation. These are the queries that AI models use to search the web while generating their responses.

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: Start date (ISO format, for custom range)

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: End date (ISO format, for custom range)

parameters.name: models
parameters.description: Comma-separated model UUIDs to filter by

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Comma-separated tag IDs to filter by

frequency.description: Number of times this query was performed

uniqueResponses.description: Number of unique responses that triggered this query

latestDate.description: ISO timestamp of the most recent occurrence

modelIds.description: Model UUIDs that performed this query

period.description: The time period used for the query
